data: Saturday, April, 1852. There was a fervor in the sky as of an August noon, although the clocks of the city would presently strike five.
Gideon's Band: A Tale of the Mississippi
Cable, George Washington, 1844-1925; Yohn, F. C. (Frederick Coffay), 1875-1933 [Illustrator]
